nodes.text: Bo Zarran was a male Zabrak beastmaster living during the Galactic War. In 3638 BBY he took part in a large mercenary gathering on Darvannis along with his trained Reek Thrasher. When a strike team attacked the gathering, Bo Zarran and Thrasher engaged them in combat, but were both killed.
Bo Zarran appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel during the "Scum and Villainy" operation.
